actions.text: Mr. Regula raised a point of order against the Sanders amendment (A025). Mr. Regula stated that the provisions of the amendment seek to amend text that has been previously amended, and is therefore not in order. The Chair sustained the point of order.

purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of July 11, as amendment No. 40. that seeks to strike $100 million from the appropriation for fossil energy research and development programs and transfers that amount to the low-income weatherization program.
